body: The bat shaman's totem is the agile bat, flitting and turning with incredible speed through even the most convoluted mazes. Her enemies do not know when she will appear, and when she does, she strikes fast and hard before disappearing into the night.
name: Bat Shaman

sections.body: A bat shaman who chooses an animal companion must select a bat. If choosing a domain, the bat shaman must choose from Air, Animal, Darkness (Night subdomain), and Trickery (Deception subdomain).
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Bat Shaman/Nature Bond
sections.name: Nature Bond

sections.body: A bat shaman can use wild empathy with bats as a full-round action with a +4 bonus.
sections.name: Wild Empathy
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Bat Shaman/Wild Empathy

sections.body:
At 2nd level, a bat shaman may adopt an aspect of the bat while retaining her normal form. This ability functions as the ape shaman ability, but the druid may select from the following sets of bonuses and abilities: movement (fly speed 30 ft. [average]; the druid must be at least 5th level to select this bonus), natural weapons (bite [1d4 for a Medium shaman]), or senses (blindsense 20 ft.).

While using totem transformation, the bat shaman may speak normally and can cast speak with animals (mammals only) at will.
sections.name: Totem Transformation
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Bat Shaman/Totem Transformation

sections.body: At 5th level, a bat shaman may cast summon nature's ally as a standard action when summoning bats, and these summoned creatures gain temporary hit points equal to her druid level. This ability otherwise functions as the ape shaman ability.
sections.name: Totemic Summons
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Bat Shaman/Totemic Summons

sections.body: At 6th level, a bat shaman's wild shape ability functions at her druid level –2. If she takes on the form of a bat, she instead uses her druid level + 2.
sections.name: Wild Shape
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Bat Shaman/Wild Shape

sections.body: At 9th level and every four levels thereafter, a bat shaman gains one of the following bonus feats: Acrobatic, Agile Maneuvers, Improved Initiative, Lightning Reflexes, or Skill Focus (Perception). She must meet the prerequisites for these bonus feats. This ability replaces venom immunity.
sections.name: Bonus Feat
